Blog.post: tonette, grazel, virlee & i went on a joyride last friday! we went to bulacan with virlee & i got home 2:30am...in fairness it was an hour earlier that the time i got home last week...woke up 2:30pm last sat...watched my favorite something's gotta give...slept the whole day sunday...same old boring weekend...

inquired yesterday for my hair relax...it's P935! but it's ok coz until aug 31, hair treatments are less 50%...opening promo! i'm so excited...it's the first for my hair to get any treatment...yup...my hair doesn't even know how hot oil feels! i think joan will go with me...she'll have a foot spa naman. well, so much for my kakikayan...minsan lang naman eh!

wala lang...house...office...work...house...it's a bit jammed in the mrt but the line in the fx terminal was tolerable. im considering having my hair relaxed...but much thought has to be put into this decision...my hair might get offended coz it's already staight & yet i still want it to be relaxed...when can i move in kaya to my "boarding house"? where? secret! basta it's definitely nearer that where i live now...and i have my parents (or my mom's at least) blessings!

gosh...got home 3:30 am of sat...had dinner with tonette, grazel, rhea & ella at the enterprise...went to de castro to visit some friends...had coffee at starbucks in libis...when i got home dad was already awake! may konting sermon pero carry lang. whole day of sat i juz slept...had my hair cut pala pero trim lang kaya di halata. mas lalo pa ko natulog ng sunday...ngayon here i am in the office working again...

TGIF! what's in store me kaya for the coming weekend...well...there's definitely one thing i'm looking forward to do...SLEEP! but i wonder why no matter how long the hours that i spend sleeping, i can't seem to feel re-charged. hmmm... ok, so it's friday...where will i go kaya? dinner na lang with friends...un lang solve na ko... i'm still kinda full with the free lunch awhile ago...so i'll juz eat very light dinner... hope i could go to a computer shop this weekend to surf... that's all for now! ciao!

what a way to start my morning! i'm currently chatting with my very dear friend jong...not so long lost coz when she left for the US in 1998...nothing has changed! its amazing how it's like she's still in marikina...feeling ko nga naka-attend ako ng kasal nya kse feel na feel ko ang mga pics... benj, thanks sa comment ha... aaarrggghh! my period is killing me...!!!

in fairness, my wish came true last night...mrt wasn't jammed & the que in the fx terminal wasn't a drag. we (w/ joan) got out of the office at around 8pm, ate at sm foodcourt, bought a new mag & read it a little before we went home. now, it's a rainy morning. it's really no wonder my colds don't go away, coz when i left home awhile ago, mr. sun was up...& when i got to shaw it rained! tsk...tsk...tsk...& now as i look outside, the clouds are very dark but the sun is shining! major wierdness! well, it's almost 9...gotto work na... free lunch nga pala kme later, lol!

ok, so ito pala ang teknolohiya ng blog...hi-tech diary! thanks to benj at na-discover ko ito. i am still in the office, waiting for joan then we'll go home na. she's the closest friend i have here in my new (well, not so new...6 mos na) work. she's like belai when i was w/ viva. pauwi na pala kme...tom ko na lang ito continue...wish ko lang di siksikan sa mrt at di mahaba pila sa terminal ng fx! ciao!
